The first result is an advertisement for apartments in Portland, OR, offering premium amenities and convenient, modern living options. The second result is another advertisement for apartments in Portland, OR, near Pearl District's finest cuisine, coffee shops, and brew pubs, with the option to apply online for up to 2 months free. The screen also includes options for the Google Discover feed, snapshot, search, collections, and more.
